room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: Island escape was super fun! Great for my group of 6 people ranging in age from 65 to 9 years old. We got out with 11 minutes to spare - great teamwork activity!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: Amazing family adventure, good for all ages. Clean and challenging. We did the Island Escape. The puzzles were challenging and fun. The staff was kind and cheerful, very professional, and the colours they gave were profoundly helpful without giving things away. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: I have done other escape games and this one surprised me. It was pretty well done but the room was very small for anyone with claustrophobic issues! The Island Escape was amazingly well done inside a room!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: Yesterday we did the Island Escape. We had 8 people in our party ranging from 7 years old to 40+. We had an amazing time. It was a fast-paced puzzle adventure. I'm sure everyone will enjoy their experience there!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: We did the island escape room with our two children aged 5 and 8. I was very pleased and shocked about how much the kids actually could do. This room was perfect for young families. We loved it! Would highly recommend this place. We have done escape rooms at other places that were no where near as fun as this one. Definitely worth the price. We escaped with 32 seconds left to spare.
